biotools.summary: A set of integrated, object-oriented Perl modules for transcription factor binding site detection and analysis. It implements objects representing specificity profile matrices, binding sites and sets thereof, pattern generators, and pattern database interfaces.

bioschemas.name: TFBS
bioschemas.summary: A set of integrated, object-oriented Perl modules for transcription factor binding site detection and analysis. It implements objects representing specificity profile matrices, binding sites and sets thereof, pattern generators, and pattern database interfaces.
